verses.text: How lovely \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* dwellings, \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Armies!

\w My|strong="H3068"\w* soul longs, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w even|strong="H3068"\w* faints \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* courts \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*. \w My|strong="H3068"\w* heart \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* flesh cry \w out|strong="H4100"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* living \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Yes|strong="H1571"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sparrow \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w found|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w home|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* swallow \w a|strong="H3068"\w* nest \w for|strong="H7442"\w* \w herself|strong="H5315"\w*, \w where|strong="H2691"\w* \w she|strong="H3820"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H1571"\w* young, near \w your|strong="H3068"\w* altars, \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Armies, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* King, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

Blessed \w are|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* always praising \w you|strong="H4672"\w*. \qs Selah.\qs*

Blessed \w are|strong="H1004"\w* \w those|strong="H3427"\w* whose strength \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w you|strong="H1004"\w*, \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w have|strong="H1004"\w* \w set|strong="H3427"\w* \w their|strong="H3427"\w* hearts \w on|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pilgrimage.

Passing through \w the|strong="H5797"\w* valley \w of|strong="H3824"\w* Weeping, \w they|strong="H3824"\w* make it \w a|strong="H3068"\w* place \w of|strong="H3824"\w* springs. Yes, \w the|strong="H5797"\w* autumn rain covers it \w with|strong="H3824"\w* blessings.

\w They|strong="H1571"\w* \w go|strong="H5674"\w* \w from|strong="H5674"\w* strength \w to|strong="H5674"\w* strength. Every \w one|strong="H1571"\w* \w of|strong="H6010"\w* \w them|strong="H5674"\w* appears \w before|strong="H5674"\w* God \w in|strong="H1571"\w* Zion.
\w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, God \w of|strong="H2428"\w* \w Armies|strong="H2428"\w*, hear \w my|strong="H7200"\w* prayer. Listen, God \w of|strong="H2428"\w* Jacob. \qs Selah.\qs*

Behold, \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* shield, \w look|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* face \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* anointed.

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* day \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* courts \w is|strong="H6440"\w* better \w than|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thousand. \w I|strong="H7200"\w* would rather \w be|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* doorkeeper \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* house \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* God, \w than|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* tents \w of|strong="H6440"\w* wickedness.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w* God \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sun \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* shield. \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* give grace \w and|strong="H3117"\w* glory. \w He|strong="H3588"\w* withholds no \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w thing|strong="H2896"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H2896"\w* walk blamelessly.

\w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Armies|strong="H3808"\w*, blessed \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H2896"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* trusts \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.
